name: 'Election Day' Part 1 Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the woman Bruno brought back to Vinick campaign headquarters at 3 A.M. on Election Day?
questions.explanation:
Carrie.

	Jane was also at campaign headquarters when she saw Bruno with Carrie Marino. Bruno told Jane that Carrie was almost a graduate of Yale. Carrie was one of the ways Bruno broke Election Day superstition.

questions.text: At the White House, who was helping CJ with job prospects for after the Bartlet Presidency ended?
questions.explanation:
Charlie.

	Charlie was getting job offers together for CJ to look at for after Bartlet's term in office was over. Charlie told CJ wherever she wanted to work, he wanted to go with her.

questions.text: The night before Election Day, everyone on Santos staff went back to a hotel room with someone else. Which person did Josh not know was gay?
questions.explanation:
Ronna.

	After Josh paid the tab for five drinks which cost him $75 dollars, everyone left with someone to go back to their hotel room. Ronna was the last to leave and she left with another woman. Josh wanted to know why he didn't know about the fact that Ronna was gay.

questions.text: Did the Santos campaign staff figure out that Josh and Donna were sleeping together?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Josh and Donna slept together twice. The second time Josh was trying to get his clothes on and make it to the door to open it for Ronna and Edie. When they heard the scuffle to get to the door, Ronna and Edie realized he and Donna were together.

questions.text: Upon returning to Josh's hotel room after their first time together, what did Donna ask Josh if he found that belonged to her?
options: Hairbrush with her name on it
questions.explanation:
Pantyhose.

	After spending their first night together, Donna went to get them coffee. When she arrived back at the room, most of the campaign staff was inside with Josh. Donna took his coffee to him and asked if he found her pantyhose.

questions.text: How many people were invited to the Santos victory party?
questions.explanation:
3,000.

	Josh told Drew that there would be 300,000 people trying to get into the party and Drew told him they had an overflow room prepared.

questions.text: What was the musical guest practicing for the Santos victory party?
questions.explanation:
Foo Fighters.

	Josh saw them practicing when he went down to the ball room to check out what was being arranged for the party. Josh asked if they were 'the Foo Fighters' and Drew corrected him by saying it was just 'Foo Fighters'.

questions.text: During his thank you speech, what was the name of the man Josh said had his college buddies shout out expletives during a Vinick radio address?
questions.explanation:
Dave.

	After Josh finished his thank you speech and jumped down from the chair, Lou mentioned that he never actually thanked anyone. Josh then preceded to say thank you, but everyone was busy doing other things.

True.

	Kate never came out and said that she voted for Vinick, but Will figured it out when Kate kept saying she wanted to help the new President 'no matter who he was'.

questions.text: Who discovered Leo's body after going to get him so he could see the polls?
questions.explanation:
Annabeth.

	Annabeth mentioned that Leo had been sleeping for a few hours so he would be rested for the celebration that night. When she went to his hotel room, she found him in the bathroom and screamed for help.
